name: lucky_spin_v2
description: This table records transactions related to lucky spins in a gaming environment, tracking user interactions and spin outcomes.

columns.name: master_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the user participating in the lucky spin.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the lucky spin was executed.

columns.name: balance
columns.description: The user's account balance at the time of the spin.

columns.name: lucky_spin
columns.description: The result of the lucky spin.

columns.name: lucky_spin_type
columns.description: The type or category of the lucky spin.

columns.name: acct_open_datetime
columns.description: The timestamp when the user's account was opened.

columns.name: total_used_lucky_spin
columns.description: The total number of lucky spins used by the user.

columns.name: prefix_sum_lucky_spin
columns.description: The cumulative sum of lucky spins up to the current point.

columns.name: real_lucky_spin
columns.description: The actual lucky spin value achieved.

columns.name: processing_time
columns.description: The timestamp when the spin transaction was processed.

columns.name: schema_campaign
columns.description: The campaign or promotional schema associated with the spin.

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: The identifier for the user's account.
